mapper.insert:
insert into Mark ( mark_id, path_id, mark_title, mark_addr1, mark_addr2, mark_contentId, mark_contentType, mark_firstImageURI, mark_firstImageURI2, mark_posX, mark_posY, mark_tel, mark_placeOrder )
select ${item.markId}, ${item.pathId}, #{item.title}, #{item.addr1}, #{item.addr2}, ${item.contentId}, #{item.contentType}, #{item.firstImageURI}, #{item.firstImageURI2}, ${item.posX}, ${item.posY}, #{item.tel}, ${item.placeOrder} from dual
